content.text: I love dressing up for Halloween, what's your favorite thing about it?
I like scaring people, my golden retriever loves to watch me do it!
That's awesome! I wish my dog enjoyed Halloween, he's afraid of everything.
I've always been a family person, I love hanging out with my kids.
That's great, I'm not good at keeping in touch with my family.
I'm sorry, that must be hard. My mother passed away a few years ago and I miss her everyday.
I'm sorry to hear that. My mom passed away too, I know how you feel.
It's been tough, but I'm trying to move on.
I'm here for you if you need to talk, I know how hard it is to lose someone you love.
Thank you, that means a lot.
